description:
Enjoy the cooling comfort of fine gauge merino wool in a relaxed, casual style. It finds a happy medium between t-shirt and dress shirt.

  • Fine gauge merino wool blended with polyester to wick moisture quickly
  • Merino wool’s natural odour resistance lets you extend the gap between laundry days
  • Single chest pocket for your sunnies and bit of cash
  • Anatomical patterning
  • Regular fit
name: Smartwool Short Sleeve Button Down - Men's
